resentments.the_cause: I try and keep habits but fail. I start things and don't finish.

my_part.description: I am selfish and just want to be obsessed with something, to lose my sense of self

resentments.the_cause: I hide my mistakes. I distract people with sparkling new narratives. I lie and gloss over details.

my_part.description: I think maybe my eyes being too big for my stomach / my ADHD deficit in effective executive planning and function. I get in over my head, fail to execute and then twist my way out.
